intents.tag: What are the effects of education
patterns: What are the effects of education
responses: Education leads to economic prosperity in the global marketplace. One of the most important effects education has on society is giving the people who live in a society the skills.

intents.tag: why is education importance in our life
patterns: why is education importance in our life
responses: Education is very necessary for each and everyone in order to improve knowledge, way of living as well as social and economic status throughout the life. intents.tag: What was your favourite moment or experience in your own education
patterns: What was your favourite moment or experience in your own education?

intents.tag: How education can change the society
